revisionDesc.change: Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;1;5568' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.kru;;25'

Vote - AcceptText - Lin4 => <:ϩⲛ ⲛ<:νόμος=grc|reg|ⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ:>|reg|ϩⲛⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ:> ; lin7=> add space before ⲉⲓⲥϩⲁⲓ ; lin15 & 19=> ⲡ<:ἐνδοξότατος=grc|reg|(ⲉⲛⲇⲟⲝⲟⲧ(ⲁⲧⲟⲥ)):> ; lin27-28=> ok for the regularization of the conjunctive form, but the whole verbal form should be included in the regularization. Lin33=> I agree with proposed reg ; lin39=> Leave οὔτε as it is. Lin54=> leave => but remove dot.

Vote - AcceptText - =P.KRU 25 => 1. and lost.?lin should be on the same line; lin10=> <:ἕκτος=grc|reg|<#ⲉⲕⲧⲏ=6#>; lin14=> ὄβρυζος?; lin15=> (<ⲉⲛ>ⲇⲟⲝⲟⲧ(ⲁⲧⲟⲥ)) ; lin16=> correct to (ⲉⲩⲕⲗⲉ̣(ⲉⲥⲧⲁⲧⲟⲥ)) (move the parenthesis) ; lin19=> idem lin15 or ⲡ<:ἐνδοξότατος=grc|reg|(ⲉⲛⲇⲟⲝ(ⲟⲧⲁⲧⲟⲥ)):>?; lin23=> <#ⲟⲩⲡⲁϣ=1/2#>; Lin27 and 28=> I would regularize all the forms of Conjunctive 2nd fem singular <:ⲛⲧⲉ[ⲁ]ⲙ̣ⲁϩⲧⲉ|reg|ⲛⲧⲉⲓ[ⲁ]ⲙ̣ⲁϩⲧⲉ:>; <:ⲛⲧⲉⲕⲩⲣⲓⲉⲩⲉⲥⲑⲁⲓ ; <:ⲛⲧⲉⲣ|reg|ⲛⲧⲉⲓⲣ:>; lin33=> <:ⲥϩⲁⲓⲥ|reg|ϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ:>?; lin35=> correct to ⲉⲟⲩⲉϩⲙ <:ϫⲡⲟϥ|reg|ⲡϫⲟϥ:>; lin38=> ⲉⲧⲉϩⲛⲏ without space; lin39=> I think εἴτε is expected, I would regularize <:εἴτε|reg|<:οὔτε=grc|reg|ⲟⲩⲇⲉ:>:> (twice); lin41/42=> <:ⲛϥⲥⲙⲛ|reg|ⲛⲧⲉⲥⲙⲛ:>; lin45=> correct =10 to =15; lin46=> <:ⲉⲡⲟⲩⲱⲣϫ|reg|ⲉⲡⲉⲓⲱⲣϫ:>; lin54=> remove the => at the end?
Submit - Entered P.KRU 25 according to edition.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
